welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kodaira, Japan! Known for its beautiful cherry blossom trees and traditional tea houses, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: COMMA,COFFEE
restaurants.description: COMMA,COFFEE is a café located in 西東京市.
restaurants.address: ひばりヶ丘3-4-47 (ひばりテラス118内), 西東京市, 東京都, 202-0001

restaurants.name: Ramen Jiro (ラーメン二郎 ひばりヶ丘駅前店)
restaurants.description: Ramen Jiro (ラーメン二郎 ひばりヶ丘駅前店) is a ramen restaurant located in 西東京市.
restaurants.address: 谷戸町3-27-24 (ひばりヶ丘プラザ 1F), 西東京市, 東京都, 188-0001

restaurants.name: Kurumaya Ramen (くるまやラーメン 保谷新町店)
restaurants.description: Kurumaya Ramen (くるまやラーメン 保谷新町店) is a ramen restaurant located in 西東京市.

restaurants.name: Bakery Cafe Crown (ベーカリーカフェ クラウン 武蔵境店)
restaurants.description: Bakery Cafe Crown (ベーカリーカフェ クラウン 武蔵境店) is a bakery located in 武蔵野市.

restaurants.name: Gyoza no Manshu (ぎょうざの満洲 東久留米駅前店)
restaurants.description: Gyoza no Manshu (ぎょうざの満洲 東久留米駅前店) is a chinese restaurant located in 東久留米市.
restaurants.address: 東本町5-1, 東久留米市, 東京都, 203-0014
